title: FADA delegation meets Gadkari; seeks 18 pc GST on entry-level two-wheelers
description: FADA has sought GST reduction on entry-level two-wheelers to 18 per cent from 28 per cent currently. A delegation of FADA submitted a letter to Minister of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH) Nitin Gadkari in this regard. FADA represents over 15,000 automobile dealers having 26,500 dealerships across the country.
